pageContext.description: Dimensions: max. sim. 81.5mm; max Te 2.8; min T.e.  ; max T. 3.0; Wt. 33.7 g,Typology: irregular edge at one end as-cast - rounded cross-section,Manufacture: fissure into plate cast - not damage; surfaces otherwise smooth and even; occasional small pore holes in broken edges.,Condition: slight bends & twists in plate; much of edges broken,Attached Material: little whitish accretion
pageContext.surface: Very thin purple to brown surface, fragmentary, giving way to dull to bright gold; small green corr. spots.
pageContext.collection: Gibson, Mr. D. J. - private (10),115 Hurstcourt Rd., Sutton, Surrey
pageContext.remarks: PIF; AFI; DF(S); SI; CI; Rec.: SN Dec. 79; Source: Sb. A.; Sub. Inf. via Jon Cotton (W. London F.U.) March 79
